title: Leauge of Legends Takes way too long to Download
body: My download bar is stuck to 79% and said applying patches waiting for 1 hour to finish the download and still Didnt move i have good internet though Please Help

replies.body:
Giving it some time is definitely a good idea, as *Crimson Marquis* mentioned. If you keep running into issues with this, then you may have an unstable link to our patching servers. In this case, I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are 100% compatible with League.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
I think you'll just have to wait it out. Or maybe you'll have to try restarting the whole thing again.
